title.narrative: School Construction and Rehabilitation Programme Third Party Construction Inspection - Pakistan

description.narrative: The project is to support Third Party Construction Inspection of a sample of schools being constructed and rehabilitated by IMC in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Punjab.
